subject: Congratulation you won the contest!
content:

So we are giving away 500$ to a number of visitors.
To receive your prize click on the link below so we can contact you.

thanks your Wikipedia team.

subject: Aktualisieren Sie Ihren pushTAN 6.0.2
content:
Sehr geehrter Kunde:

Wir bedauern, Ihnen mitteilen zu müssen, dass Ihr Konto in der Online-raiffeisen pushTAN vorübergehend gesperrt wurde.
Führen Sie zu Ihrer Sicherheit die folgende Kontobestätigung sofort durch.
Klicken Sie hier und bestätigen Sie Ihre Identität
Aus Sicherheitsgründen bitten wir Sie, die Sitzung sofort zu beenden.
Um zu verhindern, dass Ihr Zugriff von Personen außerhalb von Ihnen bearbeitet wird
Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Raiffeisen.at Kundenservice

subject: Thanks for signing up!
content:
Thanks for signing up!

Hi Ackie wants to meet you! Click here: http://n7xm8.tk/0jeb7v
This is just a quick email to say thank you for signing up to our newsletter via the Wanderlust website. 

We've signed you up to our main newsletter, out every Wednesday, with details of all the great content and competitions on the Wanderlust website.
We do have other emails you can sign up to as well which you can find below.

subject: Hello Friend
content:
Hello Friend

I contacted you concerning the fund $ 10.5 Million dollars deposited in a bank here by my late deceased who bear the same last name with you.
Furthermore in this transaction I want you confidentially reply to me directly to my private email address (lorentejan@aol.com) for more details.

Regards

Loren Tejan

subject: COVID-19  affects not only humans but also businesses
content:
This difficult situation should not affect your business.

As a lot of countries are quaratined, people are also affected by a financial crisis. A lot of workers depend on a monthly paycheck and don't have enough financial backup to just stay at home, but What if you could stay at home and earn money like in your normal job. This service provides a system everyone can use from home and gain financial stability.

A service for folks
